name: Alpha_Game
description:
Game development is paused. Thanks

My game does not currently have a name, so We decided to call Alpha_Game for now.

The controls of the game are: A, D, left arrow, right arrow to move left or right.

Space, W, up arrow to jump.

The P key is to pause the game.

This game is just as a test, I will be going up soon, and updated version "beta".
